lab5.app

Class ConsoleManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • lab5.app.ConsoleManager

  • public class ConsoleManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Connects IO with application. Also generates new commands by user's input. Static block loads all available commands to the class loader and saves their descriptions to the sorted linked hash map.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private Application application 
      private static java.util.LinkedHashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> descriptionsMap 
      private java.lang.String fileName 
      private IOManager ioManager

    • Constructor Detail

      • ConsoleManager

        public ConsoleManager(Application application)
        The only constructor. Needs Application as argument because link to the connected application is necessary.
        Parameters:

    • Method Detail

      • execute

        public void execute()
        Method that begins Console Manager main loop.

      • executeScript

        public boolean executeScript(java.lang.String fileName,
                             java.util.HashSet<java.lang.String> stackTrace)
                      throws FileException,
                             java.io.IOException,
                             RecursionException
        Method that executes scripts from files.
        Parameters:
        fileName - Name of the file contains script to execute
        stackTrace - Stack of file names that already have been called
        Returns:
        "true" if program must terminate after executing script (if there was "exit" command in the script)
        Throws:
        FileException - Exception thrown if program could not access specified script file
        java.io.IOException - Exception thrown if IO manager had caught incorrect input
        RecursionException - Exception thrown if recursion had been found
